title: Contact Us
cleaned_text: the Central Coast of California since 1985." Our Services East West Natural Medicine Center's mission is to provide comprehensive integrative medical care to the general public. Our doctors combine training in Western, Naturopathic and Chinese medicine to provide symptomatic relief and to correct the root causes of health imbalance. We seek to individually treat, educate and empower each client to achieve optimal health based on a foundation of compassion, lifestyle education and natural therapies. We offer a variety of therapies and will customize a unique treatment plan that suits you. [Acupuncture & Herbal Medicine](https://www.eastwestslo.com/acupuncture-chinese-herbal-medicine/) Chinese medicine has been practiced for more than 2,500 years and includes Acupuncture, moxibustion, and Chinese herbal medicine. Maya Abdominal Therapy [Naturopathic Medicine](https://www.eastwestslo.com/naturopathic-medicine/) It is the purpose of Naturopathic Medicine to take your health further than symptom management. We want you to achieve optimal health! Other Services We also offer Pelvic Floor Therapy and Craniosacral Therapy. Click here to learn more.
